executable.title: Filter Mask
executable.description: Checks if there are voxels inside the lesion mask that does not belong to White Matter tissue.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos da Silva Senra Filho (CSIM - USP - RP), Fabricio Henrique Simozo (CSIM - USP - RP)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant NXNNXXNNNNNN-NNXN

double.name: cutFactor
double.label: Cut Factor
double.description: Factor to be multiplied by standard deviation to define cutoff thresholds for outlier removal.
